Dec 27 23:54:43.069 INFO  Starting checkpoint sync                      remote_url: https://holesky-checkpoint-sync.stakely.io/

Dec 27 23:54:43.162 INFO  Internal shutdown received
Dec 27 23:54:43.162 INFO  Shutting down..                               reason: Failure("Failed to start beacon node")
